summary: Implements a diffusion‑based pipeline that converts textual prompts into image embedding priors for the Kandinsky model. It combines a frozen CLIP text encoder, a CLIP vision encoder, a prior transformer, and a scheduler to produce latent image representations that can be fed to the downstream image generator.
business_intent: Enable developers to generate high‑quality image embeddings from text inputs, facilitating text‑to‑image generation workflows with the Kandinsky V2.2 system.
